net.fabbrication.graph
Class TreeVertex

java.lang.Object
  net.fabbrication.graph.Vertex
      net.fabbrication.graph.VertexShape
          net.fabbrication.graph.TreeVertex
public class TreeVertex
extends net.fabbrication.graph.VertexShape

VertexShape subclass which includes state useful for tree generation and drawing.

Author:
Aaron Fabbri
